description:
http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen] crosses paths with http://anidb.net/ch32789 [Yeeger] - the oldest general in the Black Order. After a fierce battle, a generous meal, and a heart-rending story of loss, the exorcist’s spirit is renewed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: โซ่ตรวนของเสนาธิการ
